Title: Relates to carport-mounted solar energy system siting
Summary: Prohibits local governments from prohibiting the construction, installation, or operation of carport-mounted solar energy systems with a nameplate capacity of five megawatts or less, in any non-residential zoning district or mixed commercial and residential zoning district of any such city, town or village, provided however, if the zoning district is a certified agricultural district the agricultural impacts of the projects shall be minimized to the extent practicable.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to siting of carport-mounted solar energy systems
